data.title: Ingram Micro Showcase 2024
data.text:
Wolfbrook Arena is one of New Zealandâs largest purpose-built, indoor entertainment venues â and fans travel from all over the country to take in the sights, sounds, adrenaline and excitement.

Clever design integrations enable quick transformation from sports court, to expo space, to concert area, allowing it to cater for exhibitions, performances, gala dinners and more.

Since opening its doors in 1998, Wolfbrook Arena has attracted many amazing people and events to Canterbury. It has 3000 car parks and is conveniently located just 5-10 minutes from the CBD.

The TSB Arena is Wellingtonâs biggest indoor venue. Itâs a go-to venue choice for conferences, public exhibitions, international concerts and indoor sporting events.

The TSB Arena is a large flat-floored venue, with a 2,186mÂ² floor space that can fit a standing crowd of up to 6,000. Floor-to-ceiling black drapes frame the space for exhibitions, awards dinners, and other special events.

Home to the annual World of Wearable Art Show (WOW) and the previous Ingram Micro Showcase events.

The Trusts Arena is a multi-purpose event and entertainment facility which hosts a broad range of events including conventions, trade shows, music concerts and local, national and international sporting events.

With a range of exhibition spaces from 50m2 to 4900m2, this is a versatile venue that can cater for 10 to 5000 guests. Located only 15 minutes from Auckland CBD, 2 minutes away from the West Auckland Henderson Motorway with ample onsite car parks.
